title: The Curious Case of Elon Musk
description:
Elon Musk's tenure as CEO of Tesla has been a long and winding road. And the latest development, a Bloomberg News report that Musk is under investigation by the Justice Department, is just the latest blow to one of Silicon Valley's biggest names. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News reporter Dana Hull on what the investigation means for Musk. 
FOLLOW UP 
Dana's latest: Tesla Criminal Probe Into Musk Tweet Seen Opening Pandora’s Box
You can follow Dana at: @danahull
---- 
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
